issue.title: Sporadic move_base failure in CloudSim: "Unable to get starting pose of robot, unable to create global plan"

content.raw: Is this possibly a simulation time limit thing?  That time is definitely over an hour and likely over an hour after you started the run.  On the qualification runs, that’s about when the simulation would stop for me.  Were the actual runs allowed to go over an hour?
content.html: Is this possibly a simulation time limit thing? That time is definitely over an hour and likely over an hour after you started the run. On the qualification runs, that’s about when the simulation would stop for me. Were the actual runs allowed to go over an hour?
